ANU.name: Andrew Blakers
expertise: Renewable Power And Energy Systems Engineering Excl. Solar Cells
Photodetectors Optical Sensors And Solar Cells
interest: Solar photovoltaic energy: silicon solar cells, solar concentrator systems, PV tandemsEnergy policy, economics and marketsPumped hydro energy storage100% renewable energy
ANU.biography: His main focus at present is analysis of 100% renewable energy futures, including a global search for pumped hydro energy storage sites.
